update t_take_off
off_type = #{offType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

is_accepted_by_second = #{isAcceptedBySecond,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where off_id = #{offId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_take_off set off_type = #{offType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, off_reason = #{offReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_check_user_id = #{firstCheckUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_check_user_opinion = #{firstCheckUserOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_check_user_id = #{secondCheckUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_check_user_opinion = #{secondCheckUserOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, third_check_user_id = #{thirdCheckUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, third_check_user_opinion = #{thirdCheckUserOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_check_datetime = #{firstCheckDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, second_check_datetime = #{secondCheckDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, third_check_datetime = #{thirdCheckDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_datetime = #{applyDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, off_status = #{offStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_accepted_by_first = #{isAcceptedByFirst,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_accepted_by_second = #{isAcceptedBySecond,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_accepted_by_third = #{isAcceptedByThird,jdbcType=INTEGER} where off_id = #{offId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
